title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access
summary: Implement secure login with multi-factor authentication and role-based access controls
description: Develop a robust authentication module that allows customers to securely log into the self-service portal using multi-factor authentication (MFA). Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) to ensure each user can access only the services relevant to their profile and authorization level. Include features such as session timeout, password encryption, and device validation to enhance overall security.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Display
summary: Design a personalized banking dashboard for eligible products and services
description: Create a responsive and personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products, services, and account details based on the user’s profile, eligibility, and relationship with the bank. Provide data summaries, quick navigations, and personalized suggestions to improve user engagement and experience.

title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable self-service workflows for account opening and service modifications
description: Implement guided digital workflows that allow customers to open new accounts, modify existing services, or submit service requests without visiting a branch. Include real-time data validation, progress tracking, and streamlined steps to reduce clicks and improve efficiency while maintaining compliance requirements.

title: Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time updates and notifications for customer requests
description: Develop features that allow users to track the status of their submitted service requests in real-time. Integrate email and in-portal notifications to alert users when requests are submitted, approved, or require action, ensuring transparency and timely communication.

title: Application Drafts and Document Upload
summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and upload necessary documents securely
description: Enable customers to save application progress as drafts so they can resume later without losing data. Implement secure file upload functionalities to allow users to attach required documents during application or modification requests, ensuring encrypted storage and validation.

title: Core Banking Integration and Data Synchronization
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems for seamless data flow
description: Ensure the self-service portal integrates seamlessly with the bank’s core banking systems using secure APIs. Synchronize customer information, transactions, and account updates between the systems in real-time while maintaining data integrity, performance, and reliability.

title: Interaction History and Data Security
summary: Maintain complete user interaction logs and ensure protection of sensitive data
description: Implement an interaction history module that tracks customer activities, including account requests, modifications, and transactions. Ensure that sensitive financial data remains secure with encryption, access controls, and compliance with data protection regulations.

title: Responsive and Accessible UI Design
summary: Ensure a consistent and accessible customer experience across all devices
description: Build a responsive and adaptive portal design for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience. Comply with accessibility standards, optimize interface performance, and maintain design consistency across platforms.
